name: Shiba Simulator Supreme
description:
Hello! Clinton here. Hims bout to tell you bout the game. Play it. The creator must fool fill his dream of owning an RV. And you need to control ME Da Shiba to defeat knuckle sandwich. Thats the game. Some obstacles. 24hrs worth of play time. Probably. And No responsibility that comes with owning a real dog. No goats in this game haha. bye bye !

☻PLAY AS DOG

☻ADVENTURE THROUGH DOG NIGHTMARE

☻OPTIONAL - NOT NIGHTMARE MODE (WOMEN EXIST)

☻BATTLE STRANGERS (LIKE DOGS DO)

☻GET NEW OUTFITS

☻GET NEW ABILITIES

☻LEARN MORE ABOUT CLINTON THE DOG

☻FIND 10 ITEMS AND CLIMB 30 FLOORS TO FIGHT A KNUCKLE SANDWICH (SHIBA WORST ENEMY)

☻PLENTY OF EASTER EGGS AND HIDDEN ITEMS!!!
